channel.title: INtech
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtech, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Tariff turmoil may have killed the tech M&A market’s comeback
item.description: The tech market doesn’t need to be soaring up and to the right to foster healthy M&A activity. Deals can get done even in down markets. But can M&A th...

item.title: Bluesky Is Rolling Out Official Verification
item.description: Bluesky’s new verification process launches today. It mixes the old-school, Twitter-style blue check bestowed by the platform with a more decentralize...

item.title: PHNX Materials found a way to decarbonize concrete using dirty coal waste
item.description: PHNX Materials has devised a way to strip fly ash of sulfur and aluminum, impurities that concrete companies would rather avoid.

item.title: Feds accuse Uber of charging customers for subscriptions without consent
item.description: The Federal Trade Commission filed a lawsuit Monday against Uber, alleging the ride-hail and delivery giant charged customers for its Uber One subscri...

item.title: Bezos-backed EV startup pitched investors on ‘Transformer’-like customization
item.description: Jeff Bezos-backed Slate Auto has planted multiple concept versions of its EV on the streets of California. It’s a marketing tactic that teases the sec...

item.title: You Have to Rent 'Conclave' Today Because Streaming Is Messier Than Ever
item.description: An Oscar-winning movie about how Catholics elect a new pope could not be more relevant—but it's not on any streaming subscription service.

item.title: Mark Zuckerberg once suggested spinning out Instgram as a solution to its ‘cannibalization’ of Facebook

item.title: Technics EAH-AZ100 Earbuds Review: Smaller Size, Better Sound
item.description: Technics’ latest flagship buds pack even better sound in a slimmer, more stylish package.

item.title: Urevo CyberPad for Home Review: Biggest Incline Ever
item.description: This tricked out walking pad has the highest incline capability I’ve seen on the market.

item.title: The Best Shapewear (2025): Bodysuits, Briefs, and More
item.description: Get smoothed and snatched with the help of these bodysuits, shorts, and underwear.
